content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck looking at stars with my daughter when i saw one move across sky. very high up and i don't believe it was a plane.  it was white and moving fairly straight, disappearing before i could get iphone to video. very exciting!
content.summary: Star like, saw while looking at stars, but this one moved quicker and unlike a plane.

content.detailedDescription: Was looking at big dipper and by the last star in the handle "alkaid" an object appeared about 3 fingers width away at arms length and slowly brighten till it was brighter than mars.  the object then started to dim out and eventually disappeared with a slight flash.  tried looking for it for another 5 minutes but the object never reappeared.  thought it may have been a meteor flying straight at me due to the way it just suddenly appeared and disappeared in the same spot with a slight flash. the flash at the end seemed to seal the deal for me that this was indeed a meteor or space junk entering the atmosphere and burning up.  just figured i would report this in case someone saw the same thing.
content.summary: Quick brightening of star like object and then faded out

content.detailedDescription: One person saw the lights andyelled for the rest of us to look, at that point there was 8 people who saw them.At first there was 4 lights and the first light faded away and after a second the next light faded and the last 2 just blinked out. with in 3 minutes 2 lights blinked on for about 20 to 30 seconds and the blinked out. this went on for a little more than a hour. everyone there had no idea what the lights were and they were to far away to get a good look. they definitely were not fireworks.
content.summary: Lights were off in the distance (if by road aproximately 20 miles),at first there were 4 lights and they blinked outand after that the number varied. there was 8 people that saw these lights in the sky and at our distance from them we heard nothing.

content.detailedDescription: At aprox. 9:00pm may 20th 2014 east south east sky saw a bright object just fade away was not a plane nor shooting star. three stars at that time form almost a triangle from lady lake florida sky yo the east. the bright object looked like a star but just disappeared as i watched thinking it was just a formation of 4 stars in diamond shape, till it faded away. i watched the sky for a hour no clouds in sight never came back.Tonight its only three stars may 21st 2014.The object never moved any direction i could see.
content.summary: Bright star like object that was stationary for abit and seemed like it just fade away.

content.detailedDescription:
Cherry point n.C. marine airbase, while at l.A.A.M. battalion. light anti-aircraft missile battalion around noon 1973, checked power for base backup radar & comm unit, a f4 already in air was advised of 3 bogies, pilot flew tree level to below bogies & advised camera key locked & bogies in sight, radar op advised tracked bogies at 10 mach on slowing to stop, while pilot talking, comm unit got crackle, radar opt soon adv of sparkles where radar picks up falling debris, this e4 was expelled from area, later held by suits & mp & later released, i vaguely remember something in paper about aircraft failure, but was a log time ago. same base 2yr later my cousin mp d perryman miami fl was at air strip where was buzzed by ufo, many stories involved cherry point. i file this report for all to know as i am now a senior citizen, which i have some more before & after military.

thanks usmc e4 j. rowe
content.summary: Marine f4 knock out of the air

content.detailedDescription: I went outside of my apartment to smoke. cigarette and i always like to look up at the stars above my building. at around 3:05 a.M. i observed a ball of light that look like a star but a lot bigger in size. i then realized this light was moving and i couldn't believe it because i've grown up near an air force base and there is an airport by my house and i see planes coming and going all of the time and have never seen a plane that was constantly bright like this object. there was no blinking red, blue or green lights just a ball of light that stayed light until it disappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: Did not look like a plane at all.

content.detailedDescription:
There were 10 of us in a hunting party split up by twos; while waiting for sunup, as we had arrived prior to daylight, and knew where each group of two would be as we scouted the area days before; myself and buddy saw it first, thinking it to be an intruder on our hunting lease, 5000 acres of bare land but for sage brush.  we thought it a truck coming down a small hill in front of us, as it showed the sage brush in its lights as a truck would; then suddenly, instantly it rose straight up in the air a few hundred yds and stopped, pulsating and glowing different colors of light; my buddy was too scared to speak to me as we watched it not knowing what to do if anything; this was something of unknown origin; and was seen by all other members of our 10 person group; two of the party saw it up close as it eventually hovered closely over them; about 200 ft by their account and said it was shaped and looked like a bus and had what looked like windows; no noise but the grass moved around them as it hovered.
it's movements and color changes were nothing any physical known object could make, as it took off and stopped at speeds like the snap of a finger traveling great distances and back, up and down and then hovered slowly before moving off at great speed.

i was in my 40s at the time and recall it as yesterday; the others admitted on the way back seeing this object just as the first two of us did; no one wanted to admit it till i brought it up while eating at a gas stop on the way home in oklahoma.......An amazing event to have witnessed;  later yrs there i asked a guide if there were ever such sites there by locals and he said indeed there were from time to time; nw colorado is the location.
content.summary: Light of varing intesisty and color pulsating and moving erratically fast and stopping incrdible speeds at times witnessed by 10 adults

content.detailedDescription:
I was ten years old in 1968, living with my family in sacramento, california. my father, mother and i were returning from dinner and bingo at the officer���s club at mcclellan air force base, where my father worked as a civilian contract negotiator. it was around 10:30 pm. i sat in the backseat of our studebaker lark; dad driving, mom in the passenger seat. 

my dad and i had a silly game when driving to and from the base (which we did often): can we get all green lights on the way? he always ensured that we did by slowing and slowing the car, until the stoplight was finally green.

on that night in 1968, we were returning from the club and playing the ���green light��� game. as we approached an intersection in a very remote area between our home and the base, dad slowed and slowed, but the stoplight remained red; oh well. we stopped at the intersection.

a car pulled up next to us to wait at the light. another pulled up behind. there were a couple of storefronts, closed for the night, at that corner. the gas station to our right was open, and servicing customers.

at once, at the same time, we all exclaimed, ���what is that?��� and rolled down the right side car windows. hovering, or suspended, above the gas station was a large (two story? three story?) metal object, like a blimp tipped on its nose. it had one bright yellow light on top, and one bright white light on the bottom���so bright, that it cast sharp shadows of the gas station attendants on the ground. it looked like nothing we���d ever seen before. it wasn���t a blimp. it wasn���t a balloon. and it just appeared to us, suddenly.

we gawked out the window. it hovered quietly. there was a buzzing sound that seemed to be associated with the power lines it was on top of, above the gas station. it was a dull grey. it looked hard-shelled, and heavy, yet weightless. it seemed to be constructed of riveted panels. other than the bright lights on top and bottom, there were no exterior features.

we then noticed the other people at the scene. the occupants in the car to our right looked over at us as we pointed and gestured to the object. they didn���t follow our pointing, but just turned away and looked straight ahead. we noticed that the gas station attendants were continuing to pump gas, and didn���t look up. the light finally turned green, and the car behind us politely beeped their horn to let us know it was time to go. we realized: no one could see the object but us. (later it dawned on me that we weren���t able to see it, either���wouldn���t we have noticed such a large object as we pulled near to it in the car?���until all three of us saw it simultaneously once we were beneath it.) 

i remember feeling confusion, excitement, and awe. i wasn���t afraid. 

we drove through the intersection and immediately pulled to the curb. we all got out of the car to stand on the sidewalk and stare; other cars continued to pass us by. within seconds of getting out of our car, the object lifted straight up without a sound, then drifted quickly away at a 45-degree angle until it was a tiny red dot in the sky. then it was gone.

we got back in the car and drove the rest of the way home. in her typical fashion, my mother did the ditsiest possible thing: she called the fire department to report the incident (including the fact that we were returning from the officer���s club). i���m sure whoever took the call just thought she was drunk, and hung up.

the next morning we excitedly looked in the sacramento bee for a news report of the object that surely would be on the front page. it wasn���t...Or on the second, or third page either. and we never spoke of it again.

until years later, as an adult in my thirties, i wanted to revisit the incident to see if what i saw really happened the way i remembered it. i spoke to each of my parents, separately, and asked them what they recalled. ���oh yes!��� they said. ���wasn���t that odd?��� and they reported almost exactly what i remembered about it: the shape, the nearness, the color of the lights, and the fact that no one looked up at it but us.

(i���ve never heard anyone tell a similar story. i feel compelled to report it now, after all these years, since attending some lectures at the 2014 ufo festival in mcminnville, oregon.)
content.summary: Inverted blimp-like object on power lines above gas station in remote town near mcclellan afb. people were present but my family were the only people who could see it.

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling to calgary alberta for a holiday driving down the highway. the object flew down at a 45 degree angle parallel to me it had blue flames at the rear and smoke or vapor as well. i thought it could have been a meteor  until it lit the whole right side of the highway for as far a you could see and tilted the beam upwards about 10 degrees which eliminated the mountain base. the object made no noise, stayed on track travelling at aprox 40mph. i was shocked more stunned and didn't know how to react, it was something that was fascinating and scary at the same time. the object turned off the beam of light shortly after it made a correction with the adjustment of the beam. it was as if night time had been made into day light but only on the side of the  objects path. the beam of light lit approx. 1/4 mile by 2 miles.. i got out of my truck and listened and heard nothing, it was very cold that night but the stars were out. i stayed there for maybe twenty minutes and finally as i was going to leave another car came from the east. later i found out he had seem the object but from the other direction. i called the gentleman and we both discussed what we saw and confirmed it with each other. i have not seen anything like this ever, but there was a lot of ufo activity in the kootenays that year..G keen
content.summary: Bullet shaped blue flames rear, lighted right side of highway headed to mountain, left side of highway remained black

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading home from work at about 3:30 pm on a week day.  as i turned into the road that i lived on, i saw an object, saucer shaped, it surface covered with many colors and a stylized sun symbol on one side of it.  it was tumbling end over end.  i assumed it was an escaped balloon, but very large... until i noticed the end over end movement was consistent, and it was moving in a westerly direction not wavering up or down like a balloon would be being tousled by the wind.  i followed the object as long as i could and it's initial motion never changed... end over end, level with the ground moving at about 15 mph at just above treetop level.

i heard no sound, but as it passed over one house in the neighborhood, a man was outside raking his yard and he never looked up... which i thought was strange but if it was making no noise, then maybe that's the reason he didn't notice it.

the whole sighting took about 5 minutes before it moved from view.
content.summary: Classic saucer shape, but tumbled end over end with stylized sun symbol?

content.detailedDescription: On or about 6:18 am my husband and i observed white bright orb or sphere on our security camera. went out nothing there but still flying on security screen. this was not refracted or reflected light. it was not a bug or moth. we 4 still photos and video evidence.
content.summary: White glowing sphere observed on security camera

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting the lookout at ravensbourne national park in queensland australia to take photos as i have done on many occasions. at first i heard a slight hum and didnt pay much attention to it the next thing i know something flew not very high over my head it actually made me duck and my hair blew around. it sounded like someone shot an arrow right past my head by the time i looked up i could see nothing anywhere it shook me up a little but and about 30 seconds later i continued to take photos after probably another 30 seconds i heard the same noise this time louder i felt the urge to duck again but this time i looked up and for probably half a second i saw what i can only explain as a black arrow shaped object fly just above the tree line into the national park. i stood frozen for probably a minute before i got the courage to go back to my car and get out of there. ever since then i cant stop thinking about what happened and to be truthfully honest it rattled me greatly i have gone back to the area since but can not bring myself to get out of the car if there is anything you can do to help put my mind at ease it would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: 2 objects flew straight over me

content.detailedDescription: Back porch (lanai)relaxing outside over looking the pacific ocean. when looking up at the sky. not sure what it was. it moved like a white marker making lines in the sky and the lines lasted for 12 mins before they vanished completely. moved erratically. disbelief. disappeared.
content.summary: a light marker painted the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was inside our kennel building and my husband called me telling me there was something crazy in the sky and to grab my camera and go outside immediately. so i did and took a couple photos
content.summary: Started of straight then the streaks form a bow like visual

content.detailedDescription: Thought it was nightmare as a child (age 6). left a scar on back of my neck after first event which is still visible but unexplained by doctors to this day. several experiences since then (now age 36). career in military - marines - several unexplainable events in undisclosed places including dealing with fbi on said "non-existent" events. most recent event few months ago after thing left military after 15 years of honorable service. no event since to my knowledge. constant fear until recently. time to tell what i know. feel like i am losing my mind. afraid for my families safety.
content.summary: Abducted as child.Marks to prove. repeated events. child to adult. military

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my frend dog were standing outside when we both looked up in the sky and saw this massive object. it must have ben 1000 ft. 
he looked at me and said "grab your camera" so i did and filmed it.
content.summary: Saw this paranormal ufo whie smoking a cigarrette outside

content.detailedDescription:
I 1st saw ufo in quinlan tx. 11 yrs ago. i was in my yard gardening. i saw  two ships using clouds for cover on a cloudless day.  one moved over my house the other dropped down to follow gliding across the sky. from that day forward i have heard strange noises and seen odd entities around my house.  i have had many bad experiences since.
i have moved from mesquite to quinlan to forney and have been followed to each city.  i have been tormented,terrorized and physically attacked, by the "evil hive" of greys and company that has been hovering over my home and following me. i hear a loud high pitched sound like locust.  they use a tool they call a portal that emits very damaging energy from their ship. this tool radiates energy from the sun it is pointed at me and my home non stop. i have severe burns on my head, hair loss, face, damage all over body. i stay swollen and feeling crushed from being sprayed by this portal. my home and interior & cars have severe damage...Evidence of being sprayed by this weapon-comlink/portal/cloaking/tracking device.
this tool allows them to speak, travel, to enter your home, your car and to follow you cloaked. they attach.
the individuals come into your home using this portal to damage and talk non-stop using your brain all day/all night. they speak "english". they have stated humans are used for sport as we are easy prey. they come into your home while you are sleeping and cause great damage. they are thieves they steal what they want and damage the rest, constantly threatening. they especially enjoy bragging about attacking children any age, touching and groping their private parts and using subliminal messaging to get them to act out.
they bend light,using portal to appear as apparitions, appear as orbs, shapes as small as a penny to large, from white to dim to black. this has been going on for 11 years. i do not wish to scare anyone. i am terrified.....  i can mail you pictures i have drawn if needed.
content.summary: Hovers  in the area above my home

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and a huge orb that had green on top and red on the bottom, it was almost completly half and half. it also had a long bright white triangular trail. it crossed the night sky in almost 1 or 2 seconds and faded away very quikly.
content.summary: Half green and half red perfectly split in half wjit a big white trail

content.detailedDescription: On the 19th 2014,  at approximately 7 o'clock in the morning,  i cytochrome colored bell shaped object hovering in the sky and rotating... the wind was blowing and the object remained stationary.. except for the rotation... hubbard for approximately 10 to 15 seconds,  then accelerated away very quickly...
content.summary: I saw bell shaped object hovering about a mile maybe a little bit more way... it was chrome

content.detailedDescription:
1: port of ilwaco walking and looking up at birds
2: first noticed objects when i realized they were not more of the species i was observing.
3: thought it was more of the species of bird i was observing
4: the objects hovered moved slowly to the south, separated then one of the objects sped away due south at a high rate of speed.
5:felt curious then in disbelief.
6:lost sight of the object/objects
content.summary: Looking at birds and noticed multiple oval shaped objects above birds. objects hovered and then sped away at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
It was new years eve about 10:30 pm pacific time my friends husband got home from work and told us to go outside and look at these odd lights.  went out and there were a few large lights hovering in the sky that formed a large triangle and 3 more smaller objects to the right or north of the larger object that independently hovered and then lifted off into the sky very quickly. 

i took a photo and the photo showed a very different image then what we saw with our naked eye. the picture showed a solid object and what we saw was with our naked eye were independent lights. 

we also noticed that at the time we saw the object we could hear in the sky what sounded like fighter jets and the picture that i took seems to have captured a picture of them.
content.summary: Larg lights in the sky that formed a large triangle three smaller objects to the right

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i frequent brown mountain, north carolina to investigate the brown mountain lights and related ufo activity. on this particular evening what we observed did not appear to be "brown mountain lights" which we had observed in the past. 

from wiseman's view, one can see table rock which is separated from the viewer by the linville gorge, a massive gorge often called "the grand canyon of north carolina." i approximate that table rock is 2-3 miles from wiseman's view. i will attach a picture of table rock. 

we had been watching for the brown mountain lights when we first saw the light. it appeared in or behind the treeline on the lower step of table rock. occasionally, the light would brighten and then dim again. we thought that perhaps a camper or hiker was on the mountain shinning a bright light toward wiseman's view. then the light began to move. it appeared to stay at the same altitude, but moved back and forth within the treeline. at this point we speculated that perhaps it was a helicopter, behind the treeline. still, the light would increase in brightness and then dim, furthering our speculation that it might be the spotlight on a helicopter.

we watched this phenomenon for about 45 minutes. it would move back and forth, never going further outward than the treeline. finally the light lifted above the treeline, and slowly, but intently above table rock. then the light appeared to move in our general direction. within 30 seconds the light had moved from its original position above table rock to directly above our heads. it continued on its path until it was well behind us and out of sight. 

the only aircraft that could move in this fashion would be a helicopter, however this object made no noise. while it is impossible to know the exact size of the object since we lacked a reference, i know that had it been a helicopter it would have been close enough to hear. we attempted to video the light after it had began its move toward us, but the batteries in our equipment had died. while i am certain that i had charged the equipment, human error could explain the equipment. 

along with a picture of table rock, i will attach a computer sketch of the events i witnessed.
content.summary: Silent sphere at brown mountain

content.detailedDescription:
1 bad winsheim ge walking my dog.
2 was looking up at the stars.
3 in the stars.
4 pin point of light moving fast and strangely in the night sky.
5 what the h is that not  a plain not a satellite not a meteor.
6 lost in the night sky.
content.summary: Pin point light moving across night sky over several days like moving stars very fast but not like  meteors.Small changese in direction but onthe same path.

content.detailedDescription: In summary, for the past 5 days i have seen the presence of transparent alien types similar to grays (in look and height) within my home (bedroom, bathroom, and home office).  the first time i saw them was a night just before going to sleep, i notice them because of the dark eyes moving across my room.  when they notice my attention on them, they approached me and attempted to touch me, at this point i believe i feel asleep.  the very next day, one of the aliens attempted to make a dramatic entrance (traveling through a wall) into my home office and left a physical imprint of their body on the drywall/paint.  it feels like they are in another demission of space and can travel through solid objects.  i attempted to remove the imprint, but i could not.  i have also attempted to photograph and video aliens with my iphone, but it has been difficult because of their transparency.  i know that they are within the recording (because i can see them partially), but i do not have the technology or expertise to make them visible within the recording.  i have attached two of my latest videos so that you can review them.  the aliens cannot be touched by me; however i can sense the presence (coolness of air and outward pressure).  they also create a visual distortion and partial shadow that can be seen.  the aliens have attempted a few times to grab my hand and i can feel the pressure of their grasp.  i also believe they put some type of device on my person. i know that the item was placed into my hands, but do not know the purpose of this device. the aliens cannot verbally communicate with me via speech, but they have attempted to communicate via images that they can generate (dramatically).  i have no fear of their presence and they have no fear of mine.  they appear to just be curious.  i am the only person in my home that can see them and feel their presence.  my daughter and wife cannot, and they think that i am losing it.  it is very frustrating for me, but i am reaching out to you to see if you can help.  thank, raul
content.summary: Transparent aliens occupying home (extended period)

content.detailedDescription: I was at castle in the clouds friday afternoon on may 9-2014. i took 8 pictures of the views overlooking the lake region seeing nothing unusual. when i downloaded the pictures there was just one with a dark object in the lead with 7-8 glowing objects behind it. i think i just randomly caught them in flight.
content.summary: Did not notice until i downloaded pictures

content.detailedDescription: On the night/morning of may 19-20 i was outside of my house and was taking a picture of the half moon. i snapped my picture and as soon as i took my phone down i saw the object ascending and disappear. when i looked back at the photo i took i saw that i actually caught the object on camera. when i first saw it with my eyes it was ascending for a few seconds then reached an unknown speed before it completely disappeared. i was astounded at what i witnessed that i posted the photo on facebook.
content.summary: Was taking a picture of the moon and didnt realize i caught it on camera

content.detailedDescription:
On my way home from work. beautiful blue sky with white billowy clouds. something caught my eye as i was driving my convertable home. slow moving shiny white reflective metal, cigar shaped with a black band right in the middle. i pulled my car over and turned off my cd player. i heard nothing and the object came to a stop. the object (without turning) started moving the oposite direction at a much faster pace. i watched it for a total of about 5 minutes and lost it in the tree line as it flew away.
i sat there for about 5 minutes looking at the sky and then drove home. i was home in about 10 minutes. i got out of my car and as i walked to the house i was looking at the sky again and all of a sudden there was another object flying from my right to left. same color, no noise but about half the size of the first object. this one was moving very fast and i watched it go from blue sky to behind the clouds then it went behind a cloud and never came out on the other side! i watched for about another 5 minutes but nothing else happened. at no point did i ever think these objects were planes or anything else i have ever seen in my life. the hair on my arms were standing up and my heart was racing. when does that ever happen just seeing an airplane???
content.summary: Cigar shaped white shiny metal with black band in the middle. no appendages

content.detailedDescription:
It was summer time in the early 50's. the neighborhood kids were playing "capture".  choose up sides and side would hide and the other would try to capture them and put them in "jail".  i was hiding behind a large tumble weed when i looked to the east i noticed a very bright light beaming down upon the tops of the eucalyptus trees and the top to the trees were swaying back and forth like they would in the wind. this was approx. 2 hundred yards away to the east. i could vaguely see an object over the top of the trees. i first thought it was a helicopter, but i could not hear any rotor noise. when the object reached the end of the tree row the bright light went out and the object continued in a westerly direction almost directly toward me. it was moving at a slow speed, i would estimate approx. 3-4 miles/hour.  as the object neared me i could hear a whine, like a large generator would make. the object was disc shaped with a dome that had windows with a soft light from the inside.  as it neared me i could look up into the bottom of the object.  the sides sloped up ward to the center to what appeared to be a circular "porthole". the object appeared to of some kind of metal material with a "brushed finish", but yet very smooth. the exterior also appeared to be of the same material and both were a dark grey, there was no down draft or wind movement from this craft. 
as the object moved over head i jumped up and yelled, waiving my arms. at this point the object did not accelerate, but stayed at it's original speed, and direction, but the whine increased to a higher pitch. i watched the object as it continued west for approx 3-5 minutes. when it was about 1 mile away the object suddenly shot up into the sky and within 2 seconds i could not recognize it from the stars. i was probably 10-12 years old at the time and i had no idea or had ever thought about ufos. i really didn't tell many people about my experience. i had no reason, i didn't know much about anything at that age and i just kept it inside me, but to this day i remember the events very clearly.
now that i'm much older, served in combat in viet nam and spent 32 years as a police officer, i know what i saw on that night was not from this planet. at that time we absolutely no air craft that could do what this craft did and still don't to this day.
i swear that the above is true and correct and reflects the event of that night to the best of my ability.
 dayle pipher
content.summary: Object went 100' over my head

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday night my sister and i were driving home from a shopping trip. it was about 10pm and we were maybe a mile away from the house. she spotted the object first. i was forced on the road since we were in  the country and animals are everywhere. at first i didn't believe her and kept driving.  but we got super close to it and i stopped the car and shut the lights off. you could see that it was shapes like a typical saucer and from the lights on the outer rim you can tell it was rotation around. it stayed in that spot for over a minute then the light went off and we couldn't see it again. we raced home scared. neither of us had pictures or videos of the thing. we tried to take pictures but when we got home to.Show our dad the pictures they were no longer on our phone. we were standing outside when we were telling my dad about this thing. then my boyfriend pointed out to the field across the street and there was the thing again. it did the same things it did d when we saw it the first time. rotated around with lights on then the lights disappeared and we couldn't see it again. about 15 minutes later we all seen this orb looking thing shoot through the field left to right super fast. it looked like if someone would have a flashlight and run from left to right. but this moved faster then i've seen any human running. my boyfriendand dad went walking over to the field to see if they could see anything and the orb went back to the left side of the field then straight up. after that we didn't see anything again.
content.summary: Ufo sighting seen from two locations. looked like "typical" saucer shape with lights.

content.detailedDescription: This is a follow-up report to original case # 56387.  last night there were 7 objects that hovered, pulsated.  in the middle of the largest object there were clearly visible strobe lights.  all objects remained hovering from 9:00 pm to 2:00 am when i last checked.  i finally found my digital camera charger and stayed up to get pictures of these objects once the battery was fully charged.  looking at them in the night sky, they appeared bright, similar to a star, but brighter and larger. on the photos i will try to attach here, they appear more like orbs and photos do not show the brightness i saw. this is a nightly occurrence and i would love to understand what they are.  the numbers vary from 3 to 7--last night there were 7.  my camera is digital and the lens was clean.  in the photo it almost looks like water spots, or orbs, but looking at them with the naked eye they were bright, and threw off varied light.  they hovered and watching them, you could clearly see they were not totally stationary.  my daughter in law and my son all saw them last night, as we do every cloudless night.  i will post a follow up if i am able to capture a better close up, but these objects are high in the sky over my property which is in an isolated location near st. maries, idaho.
content.summary: Nightly sightings bright, hovering & pulsating 7 objects follow-up to case # 56387
